short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to distractions on YouTube by blurring the attractive thumbnails on the homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attractive thumbnails are always attention seekers and distract can distract you in between your research and can consume your most precious time.
Here we came up with this extension which helps you reduce distractions and stay focused while your most productive hours.
